f6_assessments.q0:
I think I am competent to assess this proposal as I am an active member of the Cardano community and I have 7 years of experience delivering software projects as a QA. 
The problem statement is completely unrelated to the challenge (I'm not even sure if it's a problem or something that can be measured). The solution and implementation plan are unrealistic and unrelated to this challenge as well.
Due to these reasons and the fact that I can see no metrics for success mentioned anywhere, I strongly disagree this proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
For the proposal to receive a higher score, it would have to identify a problem pertaining to the challenge and a solution to match.
f6_assessments.q1:
I do not think this proposal has any chance of being implemented successfully. Here is my assessment:
- The proposer has not provided any details about himself whatsoever and "ADA has increased in past bull cycles." is not Relevant experience
- The proposer has been a member of Project Catalyst only since the 22nd of August, 2021
- I cannot find any previous contributions of the proposer to the Cardano ecosystem
- There are no details in the proposal about who will do what, when and how
- The budget is very large and there is no justification on how it is intended to be used
- Between 22 and 25 August, the proposer has created 7 separate proposals, all suffering from the same issues as this one. This leads me to suspect that the proposals were created en masse in the hopes of gaming the system and obtaining some funds. I apologize if I am wrong.
To make this proposal feasible, the proposer needs to provide more information about himself, about the people who will help him and as mentioned earlier, to identify a problem and matching solution pertaining to this challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
I cannot find any information at all that explains how the progress and success of the proposal would be tracked, if it were to be funded.
As such, I completely disagree that the proposal is auditable.
In order for this to be fixed, the proposer needs to provide a clear roadmap describing what will be done when and how, with specific milestones and a time-horizon for the implementation. Along with this, key progress indicators also have to be mentioned.

solution: A smart contract that will air drop you a percentage of the ADA gains, over a set time, if the ADA you purchased the NFT with increases.
experience: ADA has increased in past bull cycles.
